abstract: New York City police say construction worker Konstantinos Potamousis died after falling from building in East Harlem that is undergoing repair work.

headline.print_headline: Man Dies in Fall  While Repairing  Harlem Building
headline.main: Construction Worker, 62, Dies in Fall From East Harlem Building

snippet: The police said Konstantinos Potamousis, who worked for a company in Astoria, Queens, was replacing roof gutters on the six-story building on East 107th Street.
lead_paragraph: The police said Konstantinos Potamousis, who worked for a company in Astoria, Queens, was replacing roof gutters on the six-story building on East 107th Street.
